topic.title: Benefits of Internships
topic.shortdesc: Want to learn more about the many benefits of internships?

body.p: Internships at Virginia Tech are beneficial because it gives students the opportunity to apply skills learned in the classroom toward practical workplace environments. Students can gain experience while building their professional network and gaining mentorship.
The following are great reasons to consider finding an internship and starting the application process toward a more well-rounded academic experience:

li.p: Professional Connections: The lucrative and formal workplace environment presents students with connections who are already a part of the professional world. These connections can last after the internship is completed and can create opportunities for jobs or references in the future.

Opportunities to Write: An opportunity to write should always be taken advantage of, as it is one of the best ways to improve this skill over time. Classroom writing skills can be put into play during the formal opportunities to write at an internship.

Research Experience: Research will be an integral part of just about any internship. To successfully complete a task in any field, a bit of research should be done to garner background information that will lead to a more professional product. Experiencing the research process in a professional setting will help improve any student's capabilities to use that research to produce the best kind of results.

Editing Experience: Editing skills are a vital aspect of any field. Checking for errors and working toward a flawless final product is an asset that is helpful in school and in the workplace after graduation. The opportunity to edit documents in an internship will provide an upper-hand for the future.
